NewsLetter.Title: STORE Newsletter
NewsLetter.Description: Always be up-to-date with the STORE newsletter - new products, exclusive specials, lifestyle and fashion trends.

ProductDescription.Title: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
ProductDescription.SubTitle: DESCRIPTION
ProductDescription.Description: Sporty STORE sneakers with logo on the tongue. The men's lace-up shoes are made in Italy from fine leather and have perforated inserts. On the side is the new season's STORE monogram. An inner lining made of cognac-colored leather and the rubber outsole ensure lasting comfort.

ProductInterest.Clicks: 6 persons recently added this to their cart

ProductNavigation.Product: Italian-made leather sneakers with monogram details

ProductInformation.MaterialInfo: Upper material: 100% cow leather, sole: 100% rubber
ProductInformation.IfStyleDoesntSuit: If a style does not suit you, you can easily send it back free of charge

TopBar.YourShoppingCartCurrently: Your shopping cart currently contains no items.
TopBar.DeliveryInApprox: Delivery in approx. 2-3 working days. More information on our service page

ClickAndCollect.ShopOnline: Shop your items online and pick them up in one of the participating stores. Our team will be happy to advise you on site.
ClickAndCollect.YouDontHaveToBeAtHome: You don't have to be at home by a specific delivery time; you can pick up your purchase at a STORE store near you. You can also make an appointment with our team for personal advice - whether it's about care tips for your item, style advice or other matters.
ClickAndCollect.HowItWorks: And this is how it works
ClickAndCollect.DiscoverLatest: Discover the latest collections at STORE site and place the items you want in the shopping cart.
ClickAndCollect.SelectTab: Select the "Click & Collect" tab under the "Delivery addresses" category and select the store from which you would like to collect your package.
ClickAndCollect.WhenYouPickUp: When you pick up your products in the store, you also have the option of making an appointment for a fitting.
ClickAndCollect.AsSoonAsOrderArrives: As soon as your order has arrived at the branch of your choice, you have 14 days to collect it. All you need to pick up is a valid identity card or your confirmation of dispatch. Of course, you can also appoint someone else to collect the goods; the person you have appointed must have a power of attorney for this.
ClickAndCollect.OrdersAreDelivered: Orders are delivered to the store of your choice within two to three working days. Note: Please bring your ID or the e-mail with the shipping confirmation when you pick up, so that the store staff can identify you.

Delivery.DHLIsOurShipping: DHL is our shipping partner for deliveries within Germany.
Delivery.AllOrdersAreSent: All orders are sent from our parcel center in Baden-Württemberg. Orders are processed from Monday to Friday, excluding weekends and public holidays.
Delivery.TheTableBelow: The table below gives you a rough guide to the delivery date of your shipment. If a different time period was specified during the payment process, please use this as a guide.
Delivery.IfDeliveryDosesNotMeet: If the delivery does not meet you personally, the parcel will either be deposited with a neighbor or in a post office near you. You can then collect the package within the next 7 working days before it is returned to us.
Delivery.YouCanAlsoEnter: You can also enter a DHL Packstation of your choice as the delivery address. Please use the delivery option “parcel shop” during the checkout. When entering the address manually using the regular address field, please follow the instructions for entering the address.
Delivery.Note: Note: Fragrances, smartwatches and personalized products cannot be sent via express delivery. This also applies to special offers such as promotions with free express delivery.
Delivery.IfSpecialConditions: If special conditions apply to the shipping costs of your order, these will be displayed during the ordering process when selecting the shipping method.
